item.title: CV
item.description: Vladimir Poplavskij # Senior Backend Developer Location: Vilnius, Lithuania | Email: v.poplavskij@gmail.com LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/wirtaw/ | Portfolio: wirtaw.github.io Summary # Highly skilled Senior Backend Developer with expertise in JavaScript, Node.js, databases, and Linux. Proven success in seamless system integrations, database optimization, and enhancing observability with modern tools. Dedicated to delivering high-quality, scalable solutions and leading teams to success. Professional Experience # Senior Backend Developer # Shift4 | 2022 – Present
